alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 27 at 10:17PM MDT until October 28 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. * WHERE...Eastern Fremont, Southern El Paso, Pueblo, and Crowley Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 9 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
